Package it.polimi.se2019.network

Interface ViewUpdater

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    UpdateSender, ViewUpdaterRMI, ViewUpdaterSocket
    public interface ViewUpdater
    Sender interface used by controller and model to send updates to a view.

      • sendTotalUpdate

        void sendTotalUpdate​(java.lang.String username,
                     Board board,
                     java.util.List<Player> players,
                     int points,
                     java.util.List<PowerUp> powerUps,
                     java.util.List<Weapon> loadedWeapons,
                     Player currentPlayer)
        Send a total update containing all necessary informations.
        Parameters:
        username - of the player that receives the update.
        board - updated with latest changes
        players - other players in the game
        points - current points of the player receiving the update
        powerUps - current powerups of the player receiving the update
        loadedWeapons - current loaded weapons of the player receiving the update
        currentPlayer - who is the player that is having the turn
